segments.text: And he ’ s always busy with his pictures and roses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ s won a dozen prizes for his pictures and roses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But as for his business in the city ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He lets his cousins look after his business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He sounds more like an artist than a businessman .
segments.speaker: S2
